meta_description: Explore the Forgotten Forest, collect seeds of gratitude, awaken the Trees of Hope, and unlock the Door of Bliss. An immersive adventure game about gratitude and hope.
meta_keywords: Lost Seed,gratitude game,tree of hope,adventure game,personal growth,gratitude journal
page_title: Lost Seed - A Journey of Gratitude and Hope
og_title: Lost Seed - A Journey of Gratitude and Hope
og_description: Collect seeds of gratitude in the Forgotten Forest, awaken the Trees of Hope, and unlock the Door of Bliss. An immersive adventure game about gratitude and hope.

in the Forgotten Forest
hero_subtitle: A journey of gratitude, hope, and personal growth
trailer_title: Explore the Mysteries of the Forgotten Forest
trailer_subtitle: Watch the game trailer to learn more
features_subtitle: Discover the unique charm of Lost Seed
feature_1_desc: Record moments of gratitude in your life, cultivate a positive mindset, and earn seeds of hope
feature_2_desc: Collect five types of hope seeds: gratitude, wisdom, courage, love, and harmony, each with unique abilities
feature_3_desc: Use collected seeds to awaken sleeping Trees of Hope and transform the Forgotten Forest
feature_4_desc: Unlock the mysterious Door of Bliss after awakening all Trees of Hope
feature_5_desc: Explore the beautiful 3D Forgotten Forest and discover hidden secrets and treasures
feature_6_desc: Immerse yourself in healing music created specifically for the game
story_subtitle: Embark on Arrien's journey of the heart
story_p1: Deep in a forgotten forest, young Arrien discovers a withered Tree of Hope and a mysterious gratitude journal.
story_p2: Legend has it that this forest was once full of vitality and hope, but as people gradually forgot to be grateful, the forest lost its vitality, and the Trees of Hope fell asleep one by one.
story_p3: Arrien decides to collect seeds of hope by recording moments of gratitude in life, awaken the sleeping Trees of Hope, and ultimately open the mysterious Door of Bliss.
story_p4: As a player, you will play as Arrien, discovering the overlooked beauty in life during this journey of gratitude, hope, and personal growth.
story_image_alt: Arrien and the Tree of Hope
screenshots_subtitle: Take a glimpse at the beautiful landscapes of the Forgotten Forest
testimonials_subtitle: Hear what other players have to say
testimonial_1_text: "This game changed my life! Recording gratitude daily has made me more positive and optimistic, and has helped me discover the overlooked beauty in life."
testimonial_2_text: "The game has beautiful graphics and healing music, but most importantly, it helped me develop a habit of recording gratitude daily. Watching the Trees of Hope awaken one by one fills me with a sense of achievement!"
testimonial_3_text: "As a counselor, I've recommended this game to many of my clients. It's an excellent tool for cultivating gratitude habits and positive mindsets, packaged in a fun gaming experience."
download_title: Start Your Journey of the Heart Now
download_subtitle: Choose the version that suits you and begin your journey of gratitude and hope

guarantee_text: If you are not satisfied with the game within 30 days of purchase, we will provide a full refund, no questions asked.
faq_q1: What age group is Lost Seed suitable for?
faq_a1: Lost Seed is suitable for players of all ages, especially those who want to cultivate gratitude habits and improve mental health. The game content is simple and easy to understand, with no violent elements, making it suitable for the whole family.
faq_q2: Which platforms does the game support?
faq_a2: Currently, Lost Seed supports Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android platforms. You can play the game on PC, tablet, or mobile phone, and game progress can be synchronized across all platforms via cloud save.
faq_q3: How do I get more hope seeds?
faq_a3: In the game, you can obtain hope seeds by recording gratitude journals, completing daily tasks, exploring hidden areas of the Forgotten Forest, and helping NPCs solve problems. Each method corresponds to different types of seeds.
faq_q4: Will the game be updated regularly?
faq_a4: Yes, we plan to release content updates quarterly, including new map areas, hope seed types, quests, and story content. Standard Edition users get free updates for one year, while Premium Edition users get lifetime updates.
faq_q5: Does the game content have educational value?
faq_a5: Lost Seed integrates concepts from positive psychology and gratitude practices, aiming to cultivate players' gratitude habits and positive mindsets through gamification. Many elements in the game help improve mental health and emotional management abilities.
footer_about_text: We are an independent game studio dedicated to conveying positive values through games. Lost Seed is our first work, integrating the concepts of gratitude, hope, and personal growth.
